channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Graffiti on the wall, 9th September
item.description:
The graffiti on the wall is the first thing people see when they walk out of Charlton Station, which gives a bad impression of the area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Charlton Church Lane, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned fridge and other fly tip rubbish, 9th September
item.description:
Abandoned fridge left in this hot spot for fly tipping outside Penge West Station. Also includes old cupboard and cupboard doors as well as tote bags containing waste.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rosebank, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Clear broken glass still down centre of street, 9th September
item.description:
Thanks for having edges of liverpool grove swept, but the clear broken glass remains down the centre of the street - mostly in front of the seat facing the church (outside 6 Malvern house, but spreads as far as 1 Malvern House. Grateful if it can be swept up properly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Liverpool Grove, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Elmcourt Road SE27 at the west end of Elmgreen School, 9th September
item.description:
Elmcourt Road SE27 at the west end of Elmgreen School ie opposite side of the road to house number 29 black metal Lambeth footpath bin graffiti tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture and Google Streetview link: https://www.google.com/maps/@51.4388592,-0.1035496,3a,50y,149.73h,82.92t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sKeBZS9fcXXsBAol5pL7a2g!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D7.079999357613701%26panoid%3DKeBZS9fcXXsBAol5pL7a2g%26yaw%3D149.7287897661008!7i16384!8i8192?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDkwMy4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmcourt Road, Tulse Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin store to flats next to coop constantly overflowing, 9th September
item.description:
The bin store to the flats above coop is constantly overflowing onto the street. Pedestrians often have to walk through household rubbish to get past.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drains, 9th September
item.description:
Water has been running here for at 3 months, the problem is further up the road , there is obviously a burst water main there, you can see it flowing over the pavement , this has been reported to Thames water in the past but obviously they haven’t done anything about it , but can we please have the drains unblocked by the bus stop so the water can at least drain away

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Hazard to cyclists and pedestrians.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lane, New Eltham, London
